https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ikge8aXhhgjgp9NRZnU27FDR6tm.jpg To liberate his friend who's been taken hostage by a sorcerer who's after a large ransom, a young man decides to take control of a marijuana plantation, not knowing that it belongs to his dad and that the marijuana production goes to an artist's agent.
